manitoba.headline: Brandon University expands student mental health supports
manitoba.summary: Brandon University is increasing on-campus and virtual counselling services, with a focus on international and rural students.

manitoba.headline: Red River College Polytechnic adds new health-care aide seats
manitoba.summary: The college announced additional health-care aide training seats to support staffing in long-term care homes across Manitoba.

canada.headline: Universities across Canada respond to student housing pressures
canada.summary: Post-secondary institutions are exploring new residence projects, homestay partnerships, and zoning reforms to address student housing shortages.

world.headline: Global demand for nurses reshapes international education programs
world.summary: Colleges and universities are expanding internationally focused nursing programs to address worldwide shortages of trained health professionals.
